website_summaries.verdict: This rice cooker makes great rice, but can also handle a lot of other cooking functions.
pros: Cooks the rice all the way to center
Can be used to make soup or sponge cakes, beans or oatmeal
Can make a good brown rice
cons: The size on this pot is good for 1 or 2 people, but is probably not going to be large enough for a whole family

customer_reviews.title: No frills rice cooker, makes delicious rice!
customer_reviews.text: I have a higher end Cuckoo rice cooker at home, but needed something more small/compact to bring with me to college. I tried several cheaper brands, but none made rice as perfect as this one does. This rice cooker is small and doesn’t take up much room, perfect for 1-3 people! Make sure to use the measuring cup the rice cooker comes with when measuring rice. Comes out fluffy and delicious every time, without being too wet or dry! EDIT: I’ve since graduated college and live on my own, still using this rice cooker! It’s still holding up great and works just as well as when I first bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Toffee

customer_reviews.title: Dim display
customer_reviews.text: Two cups of white rice takes about 40 minutes to cook in this machine. That cooks faster than my old Zojirushi this is replacing which took about an hour. There is no countdown timer until the last 9 minutes. Once cooked, it keeps track of how many hours the rice is kept warm. The display is really dim. It's hard to read where on the menu display the arrow is pointing to start cycles and also difficult to read the display time. I have to practically press my nose against the machine to tell what's on the display.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna.w.

customer_reviews.title: Great for small families!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are Korean and we missed having good rice at home. This is just great for a small family and will give you a max of 4-6 bowls of cooked rice depending on your portions. Having a larger one can be a pain if you don't really need it. It doesn't look as premium as some of the more expensive ones(My mother would disapprove of it in her kitchen) but functionally does a good job. It's not a preasurized cooker, but it cooks the rice all the way in without making it dry and keeps the rice texture. It does other grains/beans as well too.
customer_reviews.author: Simon H.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: This is the best rice cooker. We wanted something that would cook rice fast if need be. It cooks 1-3 cups of rice within 20 minutes, so I can't complain. I honestly only use it for white rice, but I imagine it cooks other rice just as well. We like how it looks on the counter, and i like the size. We are only cooking for 1-3 people, so having something small and easy to clean is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Indie K.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is so cute and gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker is so frickin adorable, I make rice just to have an excuse to look at it. Anyway, it cooks white and brown rice fine. My only complaint is if you're sleep deprived and accidentally pour rice into the cooker without the bowl, it falls beneath the floor and into the electrical compartment. You have to disassemble the entire chassis to get the rice out. My fault, but still it'd be nice if the two sections were compartmentalized. Some users complained about the smell, but I only smell something while I'm washing the bowl. Once it's dry there is no scent.
customer_reviews.author: A. K.

customer_reviews.title: this thing is stupid easy to use and makes perfect rice every time
customer_reviews.text: Typically insane, overwrought Asian LCD controls, but mercifully, there’s just not that much to it. Once you figure out the two button pushes you need, this thing is stupid easy to use and makes perfect rice every time. It’s also trivial to clean. So far, it’s handled everything I’ve thrown at it. I often chuck extra ingredients in to flavor the rice—that’s been a treat.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Doudoroff

customer_reviews.title: Yummy fluffy rice
customer_reviews.text: Really great rice cooker. I was using a stove top to make my rice for a while and while it worked, it didn't make such perfect and fluffy rice. It was also good to be able to leave it and let it's do its thing while I cooked instead of monitoring it on the stove. I tried making congee (rice porridge) with it and the water bubbled out so the congee ended up thicker than I wanted even though I followed the instructions. Maybe it's just the way I like my congee that's different though.
customer_reviews.author: J. J.

customer_reviews.title: Pure love
customer_reviews.text: I love this little rice cooker, perfect for one or two people who love rice. You can use non-standard grains/mixes and still get a fantastic result. Since moving I’ve had to put up with crappy rice from his dinky Aroma multi-cooker due to a lack of space and lack of time to cook. Since the shelter-in-place I’ve finally had the time to cook real food, and have slowly been upgrading all my cooking appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Ctfd

customer_reviews.title: No Latch Troubles
customer_reviews.text: I have had this rice cooker for about 4 months now. No problems yet. I was a little nervous because I read reviews that the latch breaks easily, but it is only when the rice pot is not inside the cooker that the lid doesn't pop open. I haven't had any trouble with the latch otherwise. I love the "glutenous" option which cooks the rice faster in less than 30 minutes. Great for when you are in a rush.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So good.
customer_reviews.text: I've have rice cookers in the past, the pot is always the failure point. The pot that came with this cooker is something beyond anything I've ever seen. It may outlast me. This is a solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is amazing. The rice is fluffy and does not burn to the bottom. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color delivered
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been dreaming about this cooker for a long time, especially the red version, however we unexpectedly received a green one, with some little flaws, but overall it's still a good cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s an excellent rice cooker. Short grain rice...(koshihikari) comes out perfect. Brown rice or multigrain can be an issue. But........ having said that, the cooker does allow you to alter cooking times. You don’t have to use the presets you can alter it to accommodate your own needs.
customer_reviews.author: Bumpkin

customer_reviews.title: Rice is nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my Mom to replace her 20 year old Zojirushi. She likes it, and it's easy to use! Makes the typical cute Korean musical jingle.
customer_reviews.author: Iodrome

customer_reviews.title: This is so so .
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker is very ordinary, does not have a good cooking function, the cooked rice is also not good, not recommended to buy, or buy a Japanese brand easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Candy0086

customer_reviews.title: count down timer very limited
customer_reviews.text: The one thing I couldn’t live with is I never know how long it will take to get the rice cooked. With instant pot or other rice cooker, there is a count down where you can plan other things. This one has a screen flashing for 45 minutes or longer then start the count down when it’s minutes before it will complete the cycle. I sure would like to know well before that!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Good rice!
customer_reviews.text: Makes the best rice that I have ever had. The aroma while cooking is amazing! Wish the cord retracted. Wish there was a light to let you know it’s on.
customer_reviews.author: Jadelin Abreu

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to use and makes just the right amount for our small family. Had a larger one but the rice would get stale before we used it all. Cooks rice perfectly, that is all we use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Delicious rice every time
customer_reviews.text: Love this rice cooker! After spending years making rice on the stove, I finally bit the bullet and bought this little baby. It’s absolutely impossible to mess up making rice with it. I haven’t tried all the settings yet, but the directions for all the various options (porridge YUM) seem very clear cut and promising. If you’re on the fence abt it, just buy it! I use it nearly everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Eunice Min

customer_reviews.title: still works perfectly in 2 years!
customer_reviews.text: I used this cooker almost everyday for the past 2 years, and it still works! Pleasant surprised! Very easy to clean and the rice taste great, sufficient enough for 2.5 cups of rice (feed 3 adults).
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I used it about 4 years and it sill works as new
customer_reviews.author: KH Cho

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice for two people cooking. The style is cute and it's easy to operate. Also, rice come out nice and tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Selina E. Soo

customer_reviews.title: Product works as described.
customer_reviews.text: We love this rice cooker. It also does a great job with cooking meat. We have used it for cooking chicken legs. Tender and tasty. We have made several rice dishes. My wife is Chinese and an expert when it comes to cooking rice. She has rated cooker as " very good ".
customer_reviews.author: Bloomer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with this rice cooker It fits my need - small, white rice and simple spec If you’re more of a cook and enjoy eating rice with multi grain, or cook rice for more than 3 people, you want to up your budget and go for bigger better version of cuckoo products
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kim

customer_reviews.title: I’m cuckoo for this Cuckoo!
customer_reviews.text: When it was time to replace our rice cooker, I decided I should go for an upgrade. After reviewing some of the offerings and consulting with a friend who cooks a LOT of rice, I selected this Cuckoo model. Couldn’t be happier! Easy to use, easy to clean and consistently makes great rice.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: BEST Rice Cooker EVER!
customer_reviews.text: It is Stylish and ultra Functional. Easy to clean and easy to operate. Worth every single pennies. We 3 family members got a 3 cup small Rice Cooker. It's a right size for us. Well, we eat only dinner at home. Even though after 24 hours, Rice still taste good. ENJOY!
customer_reviews.author: Jeong

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker is good enough. It's been a month since I purchased it. It works well. I can make at least 6 servings of rice though it will depend on how much you eat rice per meal.
customer_reviews.author: YeongJae Roh

customer_reviews.title: Great cooker.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rice cooker. Keeps the rice at the right temperature. This is the best rice cooker I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Myles I.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little rice cooker. Made black rice perfectly. Keeps the rice good for a long time if you leave it in the cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Cathcart

customer_reviews.text: easy rice cooker, matches my red kitchen decor, tastes great, love the menu options
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Tran

customer_reviews.title: Best Sticky Rice!
customer_reviews.text: This makes the best sticky rice, and once you figure out the different settings, it is super consistent! We have had this for a few years now and it has been wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob H

customer_reviews.title: Cuckoo CR-0351F 3 cup Electric Warmer Rice Cooker.
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker works fine so far. I hope it will last long with it's one year warrantee on parts and labor.
customer_reviews.author: Kuda E.

customer_reviews.title: great appliance
customer_reviews.text: I love this rice cooker, nice fluffy rice every time, perfect for my small family.
customer_reviews.author: Zentime

customer_reviews.title: Good for small family
customer_reviews.text: The rice cooker is convenience for single or young couple.
customer_reviews.author: Deason

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Makes delicious rice. Very easy to use. Very happy with this purchase. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ina Mellor

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the money
customer_reviews.text: I like this alot. It works so well and makes good rice.
customer_reviews.author: Jeana Kim

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and when I cook my rice still fresh after 24 hrs !!
customer_reviews.author: tess

customer_reviews.title: Buttons not reacting - disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it and got a replacement on the first one and both times the buttons weren't reacting. I was very disappointed as I read so many good reviews. Won't buy it a third time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic brown rice cooker.
customer_reviews.text: Legitimately perfect brown rice. Takes 2 minutes to get it going, 5 minutes to clean. The brown rice is fluffy and delicious and not at all mushy. Will keep for 3-4 days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT HESITATE
customer_reviews.text: I strongly recommend. if you are to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sangmu Bae

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: PROS: -Cleans easily -Can cook rice, beans, oatmeal, cakes etc to perfection nearly every time (Seriously, check out the pic of the little cake it made!) -Cheaper than some top brands -Very cute and perfect size for single person -Can keep foods perfectly warmed for a few hours if necessary CONS: -Totally smelled like chemicals coming out of the box -My button to pop the top sticks so mine doesn't always open on the first try...considering asking for an exchange because of this -Not a pressure cooker -Manuel is lacking so you need to learn some things by just playing around with it
customer_reviews.author: Discerning Shopper

customer_reviews.title: My rice cooker works great every time
customer_reviews.text: My rice cooker works great every time! I can just leave it on warm once it's cooked, and it still tastes great. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Eengels

customer_reviews.title: Great Rice Cooker
customer_reviews.text: Love this rice cooker. A little bit tricky instructions, but worth it! Cooks great rice!
customer_reviews.author: Lori K

customer_reviews.title: ... the white rice turns brown and and has a disgusting odor. I am going to contact the manufacturer ...
customer_reviews.text: Had this for less than 1 year and now the white rice turns brown and and has a disgusting odor. I am going to contact the manufacturer since this is covered by the 1 year warranty. I will update my review once I hear back from them.
customer_reviews.author: elina yoo

customer_reviews.title: Great moisture control on initial cook and even after letting ...
customer_reviews.text: Quick and efficient. Great moisture control on initial cook and even after letting the rice sit in the rice cooker for prolonged periods.
customer_reviews.author: RLY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy and Convenient. I use this for making steamed rice, soup, and sponge cakes.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Nam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Who needs Cocoa Puffs when you can go cuckoo for Cuckoo?
customer_reviews.author: Kevin F.

customer_reviews.title: Overall great product
customer_reviews.text: So impressed! But it has a bit weird smell. You should wash it carefully before use it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact rice cooker.
customer_reviews.text: Great rice cooker for a one to two person household. Simple and easy to use and clean........... Highly recommend .
customer_reviews.author: AndyF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cutest litto egg shaped rice cooker! You can never go wrong with Cuckoo products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good to use it, but limited function to cook and warm .
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: good, but buy one w/ pressure function
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other rice cookers from other countries (except one from Japan), this works perfectly and cook rice nicely. I used to have the same model with pressure function in Korea (but I have purchased one without pressure function in US because of the price), and was expecting similar level of rice taste, but that NEVER happens. So, if you are very sensitive to the taste of rice, I encourage you to buy pressure version one instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cuckoo is the best rice cooker in the world, period
customer_reviews.text: I'm Korean and ate rice my whole life. In short, Cuckoo is the best rice cooker in the world, period. This little cute beetle looking rice cooker lives up to that reputation and would highly recommend this product to folks who are single or a small family.
customer_reviews.author: Skyhigh

customer_reviews.title: this gadget is very easy to use and has all essential functions for home ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using various products; this gadget is very easy to use and has all essential functions for home cooking! One button click leads me to a delicious rice and even keeping this warm. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Immanuel Kim

customer_reviews.title: Cuckoo rice cooker 3 cup
customer_reviews.text: I shouldn't have changed and stuck with zojirushi rice cooker. The brown rice doesn't taste as good as my other cooker - the only reason why I changed to this one cuz I couldn't find the inner pan for the zojirushi which I needed a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: ALEJANDRA

customer_reviews.title: 3.5 Stars - Display is DIM and Hard to Read!
customer_reviews.text: I miss my little Zojirushi 3-Cup I used to have (I gave it away, stupid me). I decided to get this because I wanted another 3 Cup. CONS: - Display is **extremely** hard to read, not backlit at all - Buttons are not buttons and hard to push if you have fine motor skill deficit like I do. - No carrying handle - Cord is not retractable for storage - Rice paddle is not textured, rice slides off. . PROS: - Small size - Cooks rice beautifully - Super cute appearance - Good directions manual - no complaints here - Very nice, heavy black/gold coated inner pot.
customer_reviews.author: Home Barista Tammie

customer_reviews.title: The cutest and most used item in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended. I bought this one as a gift. I had mine already for few years now, and it is still function like new, and the non-stick pot have not scratched yet!! then again I have never used any abrasives to clean it. I just let it sit in water for a couple of hours, and whatever sticks to it comes off easily! one of Amazon's best product I've purchased til date!
customer_reviews.author: L. Delvalle

customer_reviews.title: love my cuckoo
customer_reviews.text: First time buyer of this brand and have been very happy with it. Eating lots of rice and every batch comes out perfect. One thing though, it does take about 40 minutes to cook a batch. You might go faster without it. However, this unit cooks it and keeps it perfect for hours. So just start a bit earlier and you'll be happy with results.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: asked my friend for a good ricemaker brand and they suggested this one and I am super happy with it. I used to make instant rice but with the pandemic it all disappeared and I decided to get a rice cooker that I have been thinking about alot lately. And it works well! I adore it and have so much rice now. Rice is a safe food for me so I'm happy to have it back in my diet
customer_reviews.author: Zgriz

customer_reviews.title: Where is the battery located ?
customer_reviews.text: As others have noted it is hard to see the display under most conditions. I would also like to know how to change the internal battery. I threw out my last rice cooker because the battery went dead and then green stuff came out along the edge of the display. It dies work oh so well otherwise !
customer_reviews.author: B. C. Mumma

customer_reviews.title: Poor LCD screen
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t a bad rice maker, and it seems well-built. But the little orange LCD screen is extremely difficult to read. There’s no backlight, and you have to be at just the right angle in bright light in order to see the settings. This alone made it almost impossible to use.
customer_reviews.author: emmsf

customer_reviews.title: You might not get the color you order
customer_reviews.text: I love the cooker. I ordered Red. I received Green. Says so in LARGE CAPS on side of box: GREEN I’m assuming picker in warehouse does not read. Also assuming the Red would work as well as this Green on does. Great little appliance.
customer_reviews.author: casyle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little rice cooker!
customer_reviews.text: I had a small Tiger rice cooker for 15 years and decided it was time to get a new one. I gave this one a try because of the reviews and it was the best thing I ever did!! The rice is cooked perfectly, I never knew rice could taste so good!!!!!! Give this little rice cooker a try, you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Ting

customer_reviews.title: Nicely cooked rice
customer_reviews.text: I prefer regular cooked rice to pressure cooked rice because it’s lighter and fluffier. This cooks rice well and it is the perfect size for 2-3 people.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: It's just a little to expensive
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I just put it in the pot and forget it till next day, no need to store rice in the refrigerator
customer_reviews.author: lyn

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I did have a little hard time figuring out the direction and what button does what. I still dont understand some of the features on it, but we only eat white rice cook so I kept it on glutinous and press cook. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Great if you are a single Asian female
customer_reviews.text: Too small for anyone else. I had to return to get a bigger one for a family of 4.
customer_reviews.author: FitSojourner

customer_reviews.title: I like this a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot. Perfect for one or two people with room for leftover rice to freeze. Only thing is that it smells chemically/plasticky when initially heating up. I think it might be the rice pot, but I'm not sure. Rice tastes just fine, so maybe it's just brand new electronic smell??
customer_reviews.author: C. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The only thing is no cover if some left over and need to put in the refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: BFiT

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome! I use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! I use it all the time. Once you figure out the instructions, which aren't bad ... just minimal ... it's almost too easy to use. Easy to clean. Fun, space age look ... cooks all kinds of grains. I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Kaczmarcik

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Great rice cooker for one person or two people. Makes delicious rice in under an hour and it's easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: It made perfect rice! The turbo function took just as long ...
customer_reviews.text: I used the Cuckoo rice cooker for the first time today. It made perfect rice! The turbo function took just as long as a normal rice cooker. But The rice came out so good it does not mater/
customer_reviews.author: Michael s McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our family, and SO easy to use. This was a total game changer for our rice game. There’s no going back now...
customer_reviews.author: "elmonyc"

customer_reviews.title: This rice cooker is simply amazing. If you eat rice often
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker is simply amazing. If you eat rice often, get this product. You won't regret it. One complaint, the instructions weren't as clear as they should be.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and small size rice cooker for 2 people. It fits perfact for our family.
customer_reviews.author: HappyFam

customer_reviews.title: Great Rice Cooker
customer_reviews.text: It's a Korean brand rice cooker - what can I say - brand is known and it works great ! Cute egg shaped cooker that keeps rice warm (not dry) all day - love it !
customer_reviews.author: Vicki W

customer_reviews.title: Consistent Rice
customer_reviews.text: This contraption cook perfect rice every time and keeps it warm for like a day. One of my best purchases
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Good little rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Good little rice cooker. Perfect for 1-2 people. The instruction manual makes it seem more complex than it is.
customer_reviews.author: yoon s kim

customer_reviews.title: Makes rice super quickly and is also really easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the money. Makes rice super quickly and is also really easy to clean. I hesitated getting such a pricey rice cooker at first but now I don't regret it all.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it !! good for one single person or up to 3
customer_reviews.author: Nooorha

customer_reviews.title: Nice to use and look at!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rice cooker. Easy to cook white or brown rice (different settings). Efficient and comes out perfect every time.
customer_reviews.author: Soirse

customer_reviews.title: Just works
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me. Not big enough for a large family. Brown rice is great every time.
customer_reviews.author: Home Shopper

customer_reviews.title: This rice cooker is amazing! It is very cute and most importantly it ...
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker is amazing! It is very cute and most importantly it makes some really tasty rice. It makes three cups of rice, which is actually much more than I thought. The rice comes out perfectly cooked and fluffy. I don't even have to add any seasoning because it's that good on its own, which is something that cannot be said about my old stovetop made rice. This Cuckoo rice cooker is easy to clean as many of the parts can be popped off and cleaned, such as the steam cap. This rice cooker is also very easy to use and reasonably priced compared to other Asian made rice cookers.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: It makes good rice. Not sure if the higher price is ...
customer_reviews.text: It makes good rice. Not sure if the higher price is justified, but it looks good and the rice coming out fine.
customer_reviews.author: boris

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and works really well.
customer_reviews.text: I love this cute little guy. And even as small as it is it makes a lot of rice/quinoa/or whatever for two people. We always have leftovers. It has given us the best brown rice and quinoa ever. And it doesn't take up too much space!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: item worked for 30 days or so, now not ...
customer_reviews.text: item worked for 30 days or so, now not cooking properly nor keeping rice warm anymore. Can't return it now. :(
customer_reviews.author: Monica L. Shin

customer_reviews.title: Love it, first decent rice I've ever made.
customer_reviews.text: I love it it's stylish, light doesn't take up much space on my counter and does a great job. I burnt rice every single time, yes every time. I am good baker but rice has thwarted me and it's depressing when I make it. Not this time. I wash it now too but this is a decent cooker that has a wonderful sturdy bowl inside. Even reheating it the next day which takes 9 mins tastes great. The instruction booklet is detailed and very helpful and one of the few worth reading.
customer_reviews.author: D. McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Does the best it can do
customer_reviews.text: Many loves for this rice cooker. Does the best it can do.
customer_reviews.author: Yuna

customer_reviews.title: Small and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Small and easy to use, I like that I can snap off the pieces that need cleaning. I also like the timer function where I can set a specific time for it to cook the next morning, before I go to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: EJ Shin

customer_reviews.title: Makes perfect sushi and brown rice - and it's the perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes perfect sushi and brown rice - and it's the perfect size for our two-family household. The warming function keeps the rice in perfect condition for days afterward
customer_reviews.author: s00ka

product_meta.title: Cuckoo CR-0351F Electric Heating Rice Cooker (Red)
product_meta.description: Teflon Coating (Inner Pot) Feeds up to 3 people Turbo Cooking Functions Made in Korea Perfect for cooking GABA rice and brown rice
